metadata.name: BURN4ORDINAL #1/333
metadata.description: Manifold unlocked NFT Edition on the Bitcoin Ordinals protocol. Accessible only to those who hold and burn the Bitcoin edition token on Ethereum, this series will offer a unique experience like no other. By burning your ETH token, you will be able to obtain a Bitcoin Orb Edition on the Ordinals protocol.Each piece of the series will be securely inscribed on the indelible Bitcoin blockchain, with the inscription order determined by your token ID. Once the Ordinals infrastructure becomes accessible and user-friendly, you will be able to trade your ETH token for a BTC Ordinal, unlocking access to this singular NFT experience. Burn page will be added to OS descripition in 72 hours
